headline: The Q3 Earnings Season Gets Underway: A Closer Look
summary: The Q3 earnings season picks up notable pace with the release of the big banks' results next week, but we've already heard from several S&P 500 members that we count in our Q3 tally. How are things looking so far?

headline: Citigroup Gains Momentum on Banamex Sale and Analyst Upgrades as Cramer Stays Bullish
summary: Citigroup Inc. (NYSE:C) is one of Jim Cramer’s Recession-Proof Stock Picks. Jim Cramer acknowledges the stock’s growth potential amid the Banamex sales announcement and consensus Buy rating from analysts. On September 4, 2025, Citigroup Inc. (NYSE:C) announced the sale of a 25% equity stake in Grupo Financiero Banamex, S.A. de C.V. CHPAF Holdings S.A.P.I de […]
